review: it grabs the wifi in my room where the chromecast was failing.  remote is intuitive and easy to use
author: Eric Fisher

review: I love it! Better than chrome cast. You can download apps right into it (Netflix, HBO...etc) that way you don't have to download them on your phone or tablet. I can also cast anything from my ipad or iphone to it. I got all kinds of tv and movie apps on my ipad and now it's like a remote control. LOVE IT! I'm never going back to cable tv.
author: Imane

review: Love the ability to have a smart TV without having to buy a new model.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Finally we can cut the cord - the cable cord.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great item - works pretty well! Small glitches once in a while.
author: Sable
